Bitcoin-N-Beers

  • Contact

Bitcoin-N-Beers is a volunteer run group of cryptocurrency enthusiasts.

We meet to learn about cryptocurrency, blockchain and decentralized Web3 technology in comfortable low-key settings.

Join our Meetup

No tech background? No worries. Join us, whether you're a crypto newbie or a seasoned vet. Our meetups fuse fun and learning, spotlighting the promise of digital currencies like Bitcoin. Dive into lively discussions and be part of our community!
